values: 屏幕；（电视或电影放映的）幕布；隔板；掩蔽物；过滤器；（体育比赛中的）掩护动作；（植物或其他自然特征形成的）屏障
放映（电影等）；播放（视频）；筛选；遮挡；保护；筛查；调查（看是否可靠）；过滤；隔离；庇护；包庇；袒护；为…提供屏障；为…设屏风

pos_mean_info_list.mean: 筛选；放映；[物] 屏蔽；审查；防波
筛选；拍摄（screen的ing形式）；遮蔽；隔挡
掩护队员；分级机，筛选器；筛分工；过滤网

word_mean_info__list.difference: 指把处于被发现的人或物掩盖起来，使其不被发现。
普通用词，既可指有意地隐藏，又可指无意或偶然地藏匿。
正式用词，多强调有目的、有意识，巧妙地进行隐藏或隐瞒。

word_group.brief_definition: 放映时间, 播放时间, 出镜时间；用电脑的时间, 看电视的时间, 打游戏的时间
计算机触摸式显示屏；触摸屏
视频显示过程；视频显示

bilingual.source: A whiteboard is next to the screen.
There's a screen in front of the wall.
Others are just staring at the screen.
bilingual.target: 其他人只是盯着屏幕看。

bilingual.source: The seats at Screen City are a little hard.
The Big Screen is (expensive) than most cinemas.
bilingual.target: 大屏幕比大多数电影院都贵。

bilingual.source: Others are just staring at the screen, transfixed.
bilingual.target: 其他人只是盯着屏幕，目不转睛。

bilingual.source: Children often spend their time in front of a screen instead.
bilingual.target: 孩子们经常把时间花在屏幕前。

bilingual.source: Show them on the board how to draw a simple computer screen.
bilingual.target: 在黑板上给他们展示如何画一个简单的电脑屏幕。

list.abstract: screen（英[skriːn]，美[skriːn]），英语单词。可做名词或动词用。做名词时，指阴极射线管等的表面、荧光屏、网屏等；做动词时，指掩盖、保护、庇护等。英语短语有screen through（筛选），例句为Science joins push to screen statistics in papers.（《科学》杂志参与推动在论文中筛选数据。） 复数为screens，第三人称单数为screens，现在分词为screening，过去式为screened，过去分词为screened。 近义词有curtain（名词）、creen（名词）、project（动词）等。
screen是linux下的一种多重视窗管理程序。在使用telnet或SSH远程登录linux时，如果连接非正常中断，重新连接时，系统将开一个新的session，无法恢复原来的session.screen命令可以解决这个问题。

yingyinNormal.en: I'm appearing on your screen. Reading the words I'm saying off of another screen.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我在你的屏幕上。念着屏幕上出现的话。

yingyinNormal.en: How about at a game on the big screen? How about at a Foot Locker?
yingyinNormal.zh: 在球赛的大屏幕上告白？戴脚链的求婚方式如何？

yingyinNormal.en: We were at the game. This guy proposed to his girlfriend on the big screen thing. That is so tacky.
yingyinNormal.zh: 球赛时，有人在大屏幕上求婚。老套！

yingyinNormal.en: What are all those lights up on that screen right there? Those are flights. Those are the active flights in the system right now.
yingyinNormal.zh: 那些屏幕上的光点是什么？是飞机航班。这些是系统中活跃的航线。

yingyinNormal.en: You took the dot back to the main screen and that's when you found the first Easter egg ever put in a video game. The creator's name.
yingyinNormal.zh: 把方块拖回到主屏幕你就能找到游戏史上第一个彩蛋。那就是设计者的名字。

yingyinNormal.en: How clear is the image of me on that screen? Pretty clear. Do I look like I feel better? I mean, it's not, like, HD quality.
yingyinNormal.zh: 你在屏幕上看我有多清晰呀？蛮清晰的。我看起来像有开心点吗？也没有到高清画质啦。

yingyinNormal.en: Is that a big number? Well, everybody can throw around big numbers. But in fact, if I were to place one base on each pixel of this 1280 by 800 resolution screen, we would need 3,000 screens to take a look at the genome. So it's really quite big.
yingyinNormal.zh: 这个数字大吧？谁都能随便谈论大数字，但是，如果我把一个碱基放在这个1280×800屏幕的一个像素上，得要三千个屏幕一睹人类基因组。所以这是非常大的。

yingyinNormal.en: Someday soon, your phone will have a little 5K on its screen a fifth generation wireless technology that will make it run faster and work better.
yingyinNormal.zh: 在不久的将来，你的手机屏幕上将会显示5K标志，第5代无线技术可以让手机速度更快，运行更流畅。

yingyinNormal.en: Now, you take that away, and I don't know what this country has left. Except a group of grown men standing around in a circle, all staring at a small screen. Looking in instead of looking out.
yingyinNormal.zh: 要是你把这个夺走，我不知道这国家还剩下什么。只剩下一群成年男人围成一圈，盯着一小块屏幕，只向内看而不往外面看。

yingyinNormal.en: Why is your screen name "John Williams"?
yingyinNormal.zh: 你的网名怎么叫"约翰·威廉姆斯"？

yingyinNormal.en: Try and see if you can find the real tablet on this screen.
yingyinNormal.zh: 试试看你能不能在这个画面里找到真正的药丸。

yingyinNormal.en: So from here, we'll jump to a green-screen shot of you laughing, too.
yingyinNormal.zh: 从这里，我们用绿色背景拍摄一幕你也在大笑的样子。

yingyinNormal.en: It's not a blue screen. It's just, maybe it was just really clear that day.
yingyinNormal.zh: 那不是蓝背景，那是，也许那天万里晴空吧。

yingyinNormal.en: I want the whole world to see Ahmadi's capture on every news outlet and every screen.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我要全世界看到艾哈迈迪被逮捕铺天盖地地报道。

yingyinNormal.en: Porn belongs on a big screen in the bedroom or your phone in the bathroom. Kids, go play.
yingyinNormal.zh: 色情作品应该在卧室的大电视里播放，或是浴室里的手机上。孩子们，去玩。

yingyinNormal.en: Grant Irvin. Scabbit screen name: "Lotion my feet." "Lotion my feet"? Really? Yes. It's a joke.
yingyinNormal.zh: 格兰特·艾文，「瞎掰网」的用户名是「洗脚大仙」，「洗脚大仙」，真的吗？真的 ， 是个玩笑。

yingyinNormal.en: Honey, this is a picture of the frame guy posing in front of a bright blue screen with a collie.
yingyinNormal.zh: 这是一张相框模特儿，跟一只牧羊犬站在浅蓝背景前的照片。

yingyinNormal.en: I don't need this lesson. I'm very familiar with the touch screen. Let's just say I put the "Goo" in Google.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我不需要学这个触摸屏，我熟到不行，谷哥的"哥"叫的就是我。

yingyinNormal.en: What the hell's going on over there? First of all, Ash, do not "Aw" every time my sister Kate comes on the screen.
yingyinNormal.zh: 这到底是怎么回事？首先，亚瑟，别我妹妹凯特一出现你就发出怪叫。

yingyinNormal.en: Seedy underbelly? You know, your black market phasers, your screen worn Lieutenant Uhura panties, that kind of stuff.
yingyinNormal.zh: 黑市？你那个黑市淘来的手提式相位枪，还有乌拉中尉在电影中穿过的内裤，就那些东西呗。

exam_freq_info.chinese: 屏幕; 荧屏; 银幕
屏风; 帐; 幔; 帘

direction_info.description:
数据源自2012-2023年12年间全国考研试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2012-2023年全国考研英语一和考研英语二共24套考研试卷，包括阅读、完型填空、翻译、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选全国考研考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2012-2023年12年间全国考研英语一和考研英语二试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

derivative_info_list.mean: n. 放映；播放；评估；甄别；检查；筛谷物筛出的瘪谷与杂质

word_family.mean: n. 幕；屏；幔；帐；阴极射线管等的表面；荧光屏；网屏；网版；检查系统；大筛子；滤网

sense_info_list.zh: 屏幕; 荧屏; 银幕

examination_example.sentence: On the other hand, Tronick himself is concerned that the worries about kids' use of <highlight>screens</highlight> are born out of an "oppressive ideology.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 另一方面，特罗尼克自己也担心，对孩子使用屏幕的担忧源于一种“压迫性意识形态”。

examination_example.sentence: With so much focus on children's use of screens, it's easy for parents to forget about their own <highlight>screen</highlight> use.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 由于对孩子使用电子屏幕的关注太多，家长们很容易忘记自己使用电子屏幕的情况。

examination_example.sentence: What is it that makes us feel we need to hide behind our <highlight>screens</highlight>?
examination_example.sentence_trans: 是什么让我们觉得我们需要躲在屏幕后面?

sense_info_list.en: test (a person or substance) for the presence or absence of a disease or contaminant

examination_example.sentence: Part of the issue is that airports have only so much room for <highlight>screening</highlight> lanes.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 部分原因是机场的安检通道空间有限。

examination_example.sentence: Less <highlight>Screening</highlight> for More Safety
examination_example.sentence_trans: 少检查，更安全

examination_example.sentence: Passengers who pass a background check are eligible to use expedited <highlight>screening</highlight> lanes.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 通过背景核查的乘客有资格使用快速安检通道。

sense_info_list.en: check something to see if it is suitable or if you want it

sense_info_list.zh: 屏风; 帐; 幔; 帘

sense_info_list.en: show (a movie or video) or broadcast (a television program)
pass (a substance such as grain or coal) through a large sieve or screen, especially so as to sort it into different sizes

exam_freq_info.chinese: 屏风; 帐; 幔; 帘

direction_info.description:
数据源自2016.6-2023.6年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight>考纲释义</highlight>
精选实考、考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2016-2023年51套试卷，包括阅读、听力、翻译等所有题型。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2016-2023年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

examination_example.sentence: Incorporating the use of social media to <highlight>screen</highlight> job candidates is not an uncommon practice.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 结合使用社交媒体来筛选求职者并非一种罕见的做法。

examination_example.sentence: What might happen when social media is used to <highlight>screen</highlight> job candidates?
examination_example.sentence_trans: 当社交媒体被用于筛选求职者时，可能会发生什么？

examination_example.sentence: A 2018 survey found that almost 70% of employers use social media to <highlight>screen</highlight> candidates before hiring them.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 2018年的一项调查发现，几乎70%的雇主在雇用候选人之前会使用社交媒体对他们进行筛选。

examination_example.sentence: Digital humans are coming to a <highlight>screen</highlight> near you.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 数字人类来到你身边的屏幕前。

examination_example.sentence: The use of digital technology can bring images of deceased celebrities back to the <highlight>screen</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 数字技术的使用可以将已故名人的影像重新搬上银幕。

examination_example.sentence: Webber expects that we will see more digital humans on <highlight>screen</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 韦伯猜想，我们将在屏幕上看到更多的数字人类。

sense_info_list.zh: 屏风; 帐; 幔; 帘

word_usage.usage:
在屏幕/银幕上，用介词on。示例：
Someday I will be a star on the big screen.
有一天我将成为大银幕上的明星。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2016.6-2023.6年8年间全四级试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight>考纲释义</highlight>
精选实考、考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2016-2023年51套试卷，包括阅读、听力、翻译等所有题型。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2016-2023年8年间试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

examination_example.sentence: With online surveys I just click the option that's closest to my mouse cursor to get the damn thing off my <highlight>screen</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 在网上调查中，我只需点击离鼠标光标最近的选项，就可以把这个该死的东西从屏幕上拿掉。

examination_example.sentence: You'll find depth that you won't get from your <highlight>screen</highlight> no matter how many likes you get on your post.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 你会发现无论你的帖子得到多少个赞，你都无法从你的屏幕上获得深度。

examination_example.sentence: Another playtime thief: the growing proportion of kids' time spent in front of <highlight>screens</highlight> and digital devices, even among preschoolers.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 另一个游戏时间窃贼：孩子们花在屏幕和数字设备前的时间越来越多，甚至学龄前儿童也是如此。

sense_info_list.en: check something to see if it is suitable or if you want it

word_usage.usage:
在屏幕/银幕上，用介词on。示例：
Someday I will be a star on the big screen.
有一天我将成为大银幕上的明星。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2015-2022年8年间全国卷和自主命题省市高考卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2015-2022年全国卷高考试卷，包括阅读、完形、单选、填空、听力、改错、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选各省市考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2015-2022年8年间全国卷和自主命题省市高考卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

examination_example.sentence: However, what my children want to do after school is pick up a <highlight>screen</highlight>—any <highlight>screen</highlight>—and stare at it for hours.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 然而，我的孩子们放学后想做的就是拿起一个屏幕——任何屏幕——盯着它看几个小时。

examination_example.sentence: They stay in front of <highlight>screens</highlight> for too long.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 他们在屏幕前待的时间太长了。

examination_example.sentence: For example, the number 7 would flash on one side of the <highlight>screen</highlight> and the other end would have 9 and 8.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 例如，数字7会在屏幕的一侧闪烁，而另一端会有9和8。

数据源自2018-2021年4年间全国各省市中考试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2018-2021年全国重点省市中考试卷，包括听力、阅读、完形、单选、填空、改错、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选各省市考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2018-2021年4年间全国各省市中考试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

word_level_phrase_info.brief_definition: 放映时间；播放时间；出镜时间；用电脑的时间；看电视的时间；打游戏的时间

sense_info_list.zh: 屏幕; 荧屏; 银幕

examination_example.sentence: Clean the phone <highlight>screen</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 清洁手机屏幕。

examination_example.sentence: A lot of <highlight>screen</highlight> time affects children's brain growth.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 看屏幕太长时间会影响孩子的大脑发育。

examination_example.sentence: Have you seen that article about touch-<highlight>screen</highlight> computer in Monday's paper?
examination_example.sentence_trans: 你看过星期一报纸上那篇关于触摸屏电脑的文章吗？

sense_info_list.zh: 隐蔽; 遮藏; 掩蔽物

examination_example.sentence: At the entrance to a Chinese garden, there is usually a huge stone or wall to <highlight>screen</highlight> your view.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 在中国园林的入口处，通常有一块巨大的石头或一堵墙来遮挡你的视线。

examination_example.sentence: Several hikers immediately started looking for her, but their view was <highlight>screened</highlight> by trees.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 几个徒步旅行者立即开始寻找她，但他们的视线被树挡住了。

word_usage.usage:
在屏幕/银幕上，用介词on。示例：
Someday I will be a star on the big screen.
有一天我将成为大银幕上的明星。
